This great app has one
unique & simple
\n goal!\n\n
Getting you motivated to move in the next
\n 5 minutes

The problem :

Ever wondered how long it would take you to be done with your workout today?

Sure you know how long the actual workout will last.

But what about warm-up ? The time to get to the gym ? And stretching ? Not to forget taking a shower afterwards.

\n\n"Heck, I don\'t have time for this! I\'ll train tomorrow . . maybe"
It\'s safe to skip this step and the next one if don\'t want to read ;)
provides you in seconds with the exact time when you\'ll be done with your workout, showered, and ready to roll
